mapper.select: select hosp_id as hospId, cl_cd as clCd, addr, cl_cd_nm as clCdNm, emdong_nm as emdongNm, estb_dd as estbDd, hosp_url as hospUrl, post_no as postNo, sggu_cd as sgguCd, sggu_cd_nm as sgguCdNm, sido_cd as sidoCd, sido_cd_nm as sidoCdNm, telno, yadm_nm as yadmNm, ykiho, hosp_status as hospStatus from HOSPITAl

select user_id as userId, IFNULL(provider_id, '') as providerId, email as email, username as username, phone, CONCAT( substring(phone, 1, 3), '-', substring(phone, 4, 4), '-', substring(phone, 8, 4) ) as phoneStr, role as role, IFNULL(provider, '') as provider, CONCAT( zipcode, '-', address_line1, '-', address_line2, '-', city, '-', state) as addressStr, status, CASE status WHEN 'ACTIVE' THEN '활동' WHEN 'DEACTIVATED' THEN '비활동' ELSE '' END AS statusStr, zipcode as zipcode, address_line1 as addressLine1, address_line2 as addressLine2, city as city, state as state, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d'),'') as createdAtStr, created_by as createdBy, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(modified_at, '%Y-%m-%d'),'') as modifiedAtStr, modified_by as modifiedBy from USER
where 1=1
and username like '%${username}%'
and phone like '%${phone}%'
and email like '%${email}%'
and user_id = ${userId}

mapper.update: UPDATE User SET username = #{username}, phone = #{phone}, status = #{status}, modified_at = now() WHERE user_id = ${userId}

select hosp_reservation_id as hospReservationId, -- 예약 번호 h.yadm_nm as yadmNm, -- 병원 이름 u.user_id as userId, -- 회원 ID u.username as username, -- 회원 이름 IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(reservation_at, '%Y-%m-%d'),'') as reservationAt, -- 예약 날짜 reservation_time as reservationTime, -- 예약 시간 CASE reservation_status WHEN 'SUCCESS' THEN '예약' WHEN 'CANCELLED' THEN '취소' ELSE '' END AS reservationStatus -- 예약 상태 from hospital_reservation hr join USER u on hr.user_id=u.user_id join HOSPITAl h on hr.hosp_id=h.hosp_id WHERE 1=1
and username like '%${username}%'
and yadm_nm like '%${yadmNm}%'
and reservation_status like '%{reservationStatus}%'
and hosp_reservation_id = ${hospReservationId}
order by reservation_at desc ,reservation_time desc

-- 사용 버전 select hosp_reservation_id as hospReservationId, -- 예약 번호 h.yadm_nm as yadmNm, -- 병원 이름 u.user_id as userId, -- 회원 ID u.username as username, -- 회원 이름 IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(reservation_at, '%Y-%m-%d'),'') as reservationAt, -- 예약 날짜 reservation_time as reservationTime, -- 예약 시간 CASE reservation_status WHEN 'SUCCESS' THEN '예약' WHEN 'CANCELLED' THEN '취소' ELSE '' END AS reservationStatus -- 예약 상태 from hospital_reservation hr join USER u on hr.user_id=u.user_id join HOSPITAl h on hr.hosp_id=h.hosp_id where hosp_reservation_id = ${paramId}
